plt.figure(figsize=(15,6))
top_10 = df.groupby('countryCode')['storeNumber'].count() \
.sort_values(ascending = False).head(10)
plt.style.use('dark_background')
sns.countplot(x='countryCode', data=df, palette = 'gnuplot')
sns.barplot(x=top_10.index, y = top_10.values)
plt.title('Top 10 Countries')
plt.show()

source.14fc5370:
f = folium.Figure(width=1200, height=750)
map = folium.Map(location = [41, 14], 
                      zoom_start = 2).add_to(f)
price=folium.map.FeatureGroup()
price=plugins.MarkerCluster().add_to(map)
for latitude,longitude,label in zip(df.latitude,df.longitude,df.schedule):
    folium.Marker(location=[latitude,longitude],icon=None,popup=label).add_to(price)
map.add_child(price)
map
source.a89c0286:
# Conclusion

It's a nice database, there's not much to explore, you can get an idea of the number of Starbucks stores, but there is one thing, the database is missing store location data, in Brazil there are none store, since I'm from Brazil and there's one less than a kilometer from my house.
An interesting fact is that in the United States alone there are more than 15,000 stores, and in the city of Buenos Aires Argentina more than 100 stores.
But for those who are traveling, you can plan with this database where they will have a coffee!

:)
source.bb77e45d:
# Context

Starbucks started as a roaster and retailer of whole bean and ground coffee, tea and spices with a single store in Seattle’s Pike Place Market in 1971. The company now operates more than 28,289 retail stores in 49 countries.

# Content

This dataset includes a record for every Starbucks or subsidiary store location currently in operation as of Nov 2021

# Acknowledgements

This data was scraped from the Starbucks store locator webpage (https://www.starbucks.com/store-locator/store/)

and it's updated data of https://www.kaggle.com/starbucks/store-locations

# Inspiration

What city or country has the highest number of Starbucks stores per capita? What two Starbucks locations are the closest in proximity to one another? What location on Earth is farthest from a Starbucks? How has Starbucks expanded overseas?
